snippet.title: The Wandering Village Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Wandering Village is now live on Kickstarter!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/strayfawnstudio/the-wandering-village

And you can wishlist the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1121640/The_Wandering_Village/

Website:
https://thewanderingvillage.com/

Mysterious plants are spreading all over the earth, emitting toxic pollen as they grow. A group of people seeks shelter on the back of a giant, wandering creature. Forming a symbiotic relationship, they do their best to survive together in this strange, post-apocalyptic world that now surrounds them. Controlling the human tribe, players build their settlement as well as their relationship with the gentle beast.
